contentrichtext.text: {{Wiktionarypar|absolute|Absolute}} {{Collier's Poster|Absolute}} __NOTOC__ '''Absolute''' may refer to: ==Science, mathematics, law, politics and philosophy== * [[Absolute (philosophy)]], a concept in philosophy * [[Absolute construction]], a grammatical construction used in certain languages. * [[Absolute defence]], a factual circumstance or argument that, if proven, will end the litigation in favor of the defendant * [[Absolute liability]], a standard of legal liability found in tort and criminal law of various legal jurisdictions * [[Absolute magnitude]], the brightness of a star * [[Absolute monarchy]], a monarchical form of government in which the monarch's powers are not limited by a constitution or by the law * [[Absolute value]], a notion in mathematics, commonly a number's numerical value without regard to its sign ==Entertainment== * [[Absolute (Aion album)|''Absolute'' (Aion album)]] by Japanese metal band Aion * [[Absolute (production team)]], a pop music writing and production team * [[Absolute (record compilation)]], a brand of compilation albums from EVA Records * [[Absolute (Time-Life album)|''Absolute'' (Time-Life album)]], an R&B compilation album * [[Absolute Entertainment]], a video game publisher * [[Absolute Radio]], (formerly Virgin Radio), one of the UK's three Independent National Radio stations * "Absolute", a song from the album ''[[The Fray (album)|The Fray]]'' by The Fray * ''Absolute'', an album by post-punk band [[The Scientists]] * "Absolute", a single by [[Scritti Politti]] ==Consumer products== * [[Absolute (fragrance)]], a fragrance substance produced via solvent extraction * [[Absolut Vodka]], a brand of Swedish vodka * [[Absolute Manage]], a systems lifecycle management software suite ==See also== * [[Absolutely (disambiguation)]] * [[Absolution (disambiguation)]] * [[Absoluteness]] {{disambig}}
